00039 #include "AnyDataSource.hpp"
00040 #include "CorbaLib.hpp"
00041 
00042 namespace RTT {
00043     using namespace detail;
00044     namespace corba {
00045 
00046     AnyDataSource::~AnyDataSource() {}
00047 
00048 
00049     AnyDataSource::AnyDataSource( CORBA::Any_ptr value )
00050         : mdata( value )
00051     {
00052     }
00053 
00054     DataSource<CORBA::Any_var>::result_t AnyDataSource::get() const
00055     {
00056         return new CORBA::Any( mdata.in() );
00057     }
00058 
00059 
00060     DataSource<CORBA::Any_var>::result_t AnyDataSource::value() const
00061     {
00062         return new CORBA::Any(mdata.in());
00063     }
00064 
00065     DataSource<CORBA::Any_var>::const_reference_t AnyDataSource::rvalue() const
00066     {
00067         return mdata;
00068     }
00069 
00070     AnyDataSource* AnyDataSource::clone() const
00071     {
00072         return new AnyDataSource( new CORBA::Any(mdata.in()));
00073     }
00074 
00075 
00076     AnyDataSource* AnyDataSource::copy( std::map<const DataSourceBase*, DataSourceBase*>& alreadyCloned ) const {
00077         // no copy needed, share this with all instances.
00078         return const_cast<AnyDataSource*>(this);
00079     }
00080     }
